class.name: LassoPoint
class.brief_description: Represents a point in the LassoDB system used for Voronoi-based selection.
class.description: LassoPoint stores data for an interactable object's position and size, influencing its Voronoi hitbox in LassoDB. It allows enabling snapping and adjusting parameters to control selection behavior, such as snap lock and power.

method.name: enable_snapping
method.description: Enables or disables the ability for this point to snap to selections based on user input.

method.name: get_origin
method.description: Returns the origin Node associated with this LassoPoint, typically the interactable object it represents.

method.name: get_size
method.description: Returns the size of the LassoPoint, influencing the multiplicative weight of its Voronoi hitbox.

method.name: get_snap_locked
method.description: Returns true if the point's snap position is locked, preventing automatic updates based on movement.

method.name: get_snap_score
method.description: Returns the current snap score, which determines selection priority based on proximity and other factors.

method.name: get_snapping_enabled
method.description: Returns true if snapping is currently enabled for this point.

method.name: get_snapping_power
method.description: Returns the snapping power, which affects the influence of this point in selection calculations.

method.name: register_point
method.description: Registers this point with a LassoDB database, associating it with the given origin Node for Voronoi calculations.

method.name: set_size
method.description: Sets the size of the LassoPoint, adjusting its weight in the Voronoi diagram.

method.name: set_snap_locked
method.description: Locks or unlocks the snap position, maintaining its current state if locked.

method.name: set_snapping_power
method.description: Sets the snapping power, modifying how strongly this point attracts the selection.

method.name: unregister_point
method.description: Unregisters this point from its associated LassoDB, removing it from Voronoi calculations.
